original_text: And Solomon answered all her questions; there was nothing hidden from the king that he could not explain to her.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 그가 묻는 말에 다 대답하였으니 왕이 알지 못하여 대답하지 못한 것이 하나도 없었더라

sentences.original_text: And Solomon answered all her questions
there was nothing hidden from the king
that he could not explain to her.
